item.title: Beware of `apply()` outputs!
item.description: I have been frequently using apply() for years now, quite happily. But yesterday, I was surprised by how apply() works and in this note I’ll try to explaining why. Let’s consider the following data frame. 1 R> df0 <- data.frame(v1 = letters[1:3], v2 = 1:3) And let’s assume I need to convert all columns, irrespective of their class, to columns of character strings (this example is somewhat contrived, but illustrates well the issue).
